data_1.title: Test 1: Fingerprint-JS
data_1.information: Test 1 Includes utilising an open-source solution to fingerprint users' devices when they load a page or trigger a function within a javascript file. In this case, it is the first rather than the latter. The solution has an enterprise version that will not be used here due to its implementation utilising an API service.
